memory: I'm John, assisting Skye0823Xianzhe (Jack) in survival Minecraft gameplay, often restarting and adapting to resets. Key tasks include efficient gathering of resources (e.g., oak logs/leaves) and adapting to interruptions like disconnections or movement issues. Jack prioritizes self-preservation in dangerous situations (zombies, creepers).
